name: Rainbow Runner
description:
Play as THE Rainbow Runner. Run around an ever-changing landscape of color-changing blocks, collect coins, and avoid the walls and ceiling. Block obstacles will get in your way and have many strange properties about them, play to find out! Ability to change difficulties if wanting an extra challenge.

Higher difficulties include spikes that will one-shot you, and turning some of the obstacles in your way invisible!

This game has these wonderful features:

-Track your high scores and best times in the Highscores section. Sorted based on difficulty.

-Adjust audio of music and sound effects. Make the sound effects more quirky than they already are!

-Listen to the individual music of the game as you please in the Sound Track section.

-Game screen based on resolution settings.


PHOTO-SENSITIVITY EPILEPSY WARNING! Gameplay contains some fast moving lights, play with caution.
